summary: Implements a unified handler that processes chat completion requests in an OpenAI‑compatible format, supporting both regular and streaming responses with synchronous and asynchronous execution. It abstracts provider‑specific details, manages HTTP communication, error handling, and converts raw provider outputs into standardized response objects.
business_intent: Provide a consistent, OpenAI‑style interface for applications to obtain chat responses from various large language model services, simplifying integration and enabling streaming and async capabilities across multiple providers.
